mapper.insert: INSERT INTO base_board (board_title, board_content, board_writer, category_board) VALUES (#{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardWriter}, #{categoryBoard});
mapper.select:
SELECT *
FROM base_board
WHERE category_board LIKE 'FREE'
ORDER BY board_no DESC
LIMIT 5;
